mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, name, phone_number, role, is_terms_agreed, is_privacy_policy_agreed, is_marketing_agreed, created_at) VALUES (#{email}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{role}, #{isTermsAgreed}, #{isPrivacyPolicyAgreed}, #{isMarketingAgreed}, #{createdAt})
INSERT INTO user_profiles (height, weight, gender, body_type_id, user_id) VALUES (#{height}, #{weight}, #{gender}, #{bodyTypeId}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO user_credentials (password_hash, oauth_id, oauth_provider, user_id) VALUES (#{passwordHash}, #{oauthId}, #{oauthProvider}, #{userId})
INSERT INTO user_tokens (refresh_token, expired_at, user_id) VALUES (#{refreshToken}, #{expiredAt}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, email, name, role, FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
